description:
If you or your loved one has suffered personal injuries in Troy, our Ohio team of attorneys is ready to fight for you. The Attkisson Law Firm, LLC, provides same-day appointments and will not hesitate to travel to you. While you focus on healing, we focus on securing your compensation.

Our results at The Attkisson Law Firm, LLC

We cannot promise to win every case we take on, but we do everything in our power to make winning the final outcome. These are some of the case results we are most proud of:

  • $3,250,000 for a car crash
  • $1,650,000 for a car crash
  • $1,000,000 for a pedestrian accident
  • $315,000 for a motorcycle accident
  • $190,000 for a client who fell from a TV antenna
  • $140,000 for a dog-related incident

Our team of personal injury lawyers

Together, we bring a combined 50 years of experience to every personal injury case we tackle. Over the years, one of the things we learned is that direct access to our attorneys puts clients at ease and improves the accuracy of information supplied. We want our clients to see us not only as their legal advocates but also as their moral support. The first consultation with our law firm is free.
